entry.title: Photos Post 22: Special Events (after 1975), Part 38
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 2 Photos from the special event 1913-0000 Pūjā, Maharashtra, India have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 2 high resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 3 Photos of the event in the smallest gallery: India 1913.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!
